trans-unit.source: A wrapping-token that handles encryption for a token that does not natively support it.
trans-unit.target: 处理的令牌的加密包装令牌的不以本机方式支持它。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> cannot encrypt itself, so to issue an encrypted SAML11 assertion, wrap a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> with an EncryptedSecurityToken and provide appropriate <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>无法加密本身，才能发出加密的 SAML11 断言，将包装<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>与 EncryptedSecurityToken 并提供相应<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken"></xref> class for the specified token by using the specified encrypting credentials.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken"></xref>通过使用指定的加密凭据指定的标记的类。

trans-unit.source: Inherited from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: 从<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>继承

trans-unit.source: The token to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: 要加密的令牌。

trans-unit.source: The credentials to use to encrypt the token.
trans-unit.target: 要使用对令牌进行加密的凭据。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the credentials to use for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 获取要用于加密的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The credentials to use for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 要用于加密的凭据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 获取安全令牌的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: 安全令牌的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance can be resolved to the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例的密钥标识符能否解析为指定的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: Inherited from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: 从<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>继承

trans-unit.source: A key identifier clause to compare to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要与此实例进行比较的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key identifier clause can be resolved by this instance; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的密钥标识符子句可以解决此实例;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key for the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的密钥标识符子句的密钥。

trans-unit.source: Inherited from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: 从<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>继承

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause to get the key for.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取密钥的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: The key.
trans-unit.target: 键。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: 获取与安全令牌相关联的加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: Inherited from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: 从<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>继承

trans-unit.source: The set of keys associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: 与安全令牌相关联的密钥集。

trans-unit.source: Gets the encrypted token.
trans-unit.target: 获取加密的令牌。

trans-unit.source: The encrypted token.
trans-unit.target: 加密的令牌。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first instant in time at which the security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取安全令牌无效的时间的最初时刻。

trans-unit.source: The instant in time at which the security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 中的安全令牌有效时间瞬间。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last instant in time at which the security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取的最后时刻安全令牌无效。

trans-unit.source: The last instant in time at which the security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 即时中安全令牌有效时间的最后一个。
